name: Swoop (Ion International)
overview: In this primitive (albeit not too bad for a type-in) Galaxian like shooter, you mission is to destroy a bunch of mutant/alien birds that are hell-bent on doing the same to you. Designed by Tony Brantner and published by Ion International in Ahoy Ahoy! 1986/04 (Issue #28) Not to be confused with the 1984 Micro Power release of the same name.
